about_the_game: Selections of art from the ‘The Art of Death Stranding” by Titan Books, including pieces of concept art for the characters, equipment, locations and creatures featured in the game, including artwork by acclaimed artist Yoji Shinkawa.
detailed_description: Selections of art from the ‘The Art of Death Stranding” by Titan Books, including pieces of concept art for the characters, equipment, locations and creatures featured in the game, including artwork by acclaimed artist Yoji Shinkawa.
